prompt.content: Using LendingTree Inc. (ticker: TREE) 10-K for FY2024 and FRED data on new originations of large bank consumer mortgages, calculate FY2024 operating income of Home segment. Assume y/y % change of home business revenue from FY2023 to FY2024 equal to y/y growth rate of new originations of large bank consumer mortgages (annual, in US$) and home segment operating profit margin equal to conslolidated operating profit margin. Provide the answer in $M, rounded to 1 decimal.

rubrics.name: FY2023 Home segment revenue (located in Note 3 to FS) = $143.753M

messages.content: FY2023 Home segment revenue (located in Note 3 to FS) = $143.753M

rubrics.name: 2023 Large Bank Consumer Mortgage Originations (quarterly sum) (from FRED data as specified in the question)= 46.51 + 61.10 + 59.28 + 45.50 = 212.39

messages.content: 2023 Large Bank Consumer Mortgage Originations (quarterly sum) (from FRED data as specified in the question)= 46.51 + 61.10 + 59.28 + 45.50 = 212.39

rubrics.name: 2024 Large Bank Consumer Mortgage Originations (quarterly sum) (from FRED data as specified in the question) = 43.33 + 59.64 + 62.57 + 67.98 = 233.52

messages.content: 2024 Large Bank Consumer Mortgage Originations (quarterly sum) (from FRED data as specified in the question) = 43.33 + 59.64 + 62.57 + 67.98 = 233.52

rubrics.name: Year‑over‑year growth of large bank consumer mortgage originations = 2024 originations / 2023 originations -1 = 9.9487%

messages.content: Year‑over‑year growth of large bank consumer mortgage originations = 2024 originations / 2023 originations -1 = 9.9487%

rubrics.name: Projected FY2024 Home segment revenue = FY23 Revenue * assumed growth rate (calculated at previous step) $143.753M × 1.099487 = $158.0545M

messages.content: Projected FY2024 Home segment revenue = FY23 Revenue * assumed growth rate (calculated at previous step) $143.753M × 1.099487 = $158.0545M

rubrics.name: Consolidated operating margin for FY24 =operating profit / Revenue = 4.9573%

messages.content: Consolidated operating margin for FY24 =operating profit / Revenue = 4.9573%

rubrics.name: Final FY2024 Home segment operating income (rounded to 1 decimal) = $7.8M

messages.content: Final FY2024 Home segment operating income (rounded to 1 decimal) = $7.8M
